metadata.title: CVE-2024-11705 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: `NSC_DeriveKey` inadvertently assumed that the `phKey` parameter is alwaysnon-NULL. When it was passed as NULL, a segmentation fault (SEGV) occurred,leading to crashes. This behavior conflicted with the PKCS#11 v3.0specification, which allows `phKey` to be NULL for certain mechanisms. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 133 and Thunderbird < 133.
